text: Claro is a Mexican conglomerate of telecommunications, entertainment, cloud services, streaming and electronic commerce present in Latin America.https://teletime.com.br/24/10/2003/anatel-aprova-transferencia-da-bcp- para-a-claro/ Claro has a presence in 15 countries on the continent, with nearly 262 million wireless customers, 30 million fixed lines, 17 million broadband accesses and 16 million cable television subscribers. ==References== Category:Telecommunications companies of Mexico
title: Claro
